actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to amend the contract between the United States and the Purgatoire River Conservancy District (contract number 7-07-w0095).

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to amend the contract between the United States and the Purgatoire River Conservancy District, Colorado, regarding certain costs which the District must pay to: (1) reduce the ceiling on such payments from 19.82 percent to 9 percent of the costs involved; and (2) limit the annual rate of increase in such costs to the rate of increase of the Consumer Price Index.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to amend the contract between the United States and the Purgatoire River Conservancy District (contract number 7-07-w0095).
